title.rendered: Tamil Nadu Premier League 2022 Schedule, Venue, Teams, and their sponsors, and Where to Watch

content.rendered:
It is just like TNPL was waiting for the IPL to get over and to keep everyone entertained with its regional sport of cricket organized as Tamil Nadu Premier League starting from June 23. So, in this article we will look at the complete match details such as the venue where all these teams are playing, their sponsors and from where we can watch these mind-blowing matches live and so on. So, let’s start.

TNPL 2022 Date of Commencement – June 23rd, 2022

TNPL 2022 Playing Teams

  • Salem Spartans
  • LYCA Kovai Kings
  • Chepauk Super Gillies
  • Nellai Royal Kings
  • Dindigul Dragons
  • Ruby Trichy Warriors
  • Siechem Madurai Panthers
  • IDream Tiruppur Tamizhans

TNPL 2022 Playing Teams and their sponsors

Sponsors of the team Salem Spartans are

Skyexch – (Title Sponsor)

  • Taj777 news – (Associate Sponsor)
  • Freyer – (Associate Sponsor)
  • AVR Pay News (Associate Sponsor)
  • Vision11 – (Associate Sponsor)
Sponsors of the team Siechem Madurai Panthers are
  • MARC (Title Sponsor)
  • Leo Coffee
  • Sportasy
  • EVIVO, the solar experts,
  • Team Trans Logistics (key Sponsor)
  • Orange Retail finance (key Sponsor)
  • OSG Cricket (CO Sponsor)
Sponsors of the team IDream Tiruppur Tamizhans
  • Dafa News – (Title Sponsor)
LYCA Kovai Kings

Playon99news as Principal Sponsor

Chepauk Super Gillies – Yet to Announce
Nellai Royal Kings – Yet to Announce
Dindigul Dragons – Yet to Announce
Ruby Trichy Warriors – Yet to Announce

TNPL 2022 Where to Watch

  • Live Telecast – Star Sports Network
  • Live Streaming – Disney + Hotstar

The Taj777 news has been named as the associate partner for Salem Spartans. Taj777 News through its digital app platform will provide articles and coverage containing useful statistics and the ranking of your favorite team and player exclusively.

TNPL 2022 All Match Schedule

Stay connected with Taj777 News, for all the useful updates of TNPL.
